name: Telegram Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow on a Telegram update
natural_language_description: 这是 Telegram Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow on a Telegram update

telegramTriggerNotice.displayName: Due to Telegram API limitations, you can use just one Telegram trigger for each bot at a time
telegramTriggerNotice.name: telegramTriggerNotice
telegramTriggerNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due to Telegram API limitations, you can use just one Telegram trigger for each bot at a time

updates.name: updates
updates.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Callback Query (值: callback_query) - Trigger on new incoming callback query
Channel Post (值: channel_post) - Trigger on new incoming channel post of any kind — text, photo, sticker, etc
Edited Channel Post (值: edited_channel_post) - Trigger on new version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited
Edited Message (值: edited_message) - Trigger on new version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited
Inline Query (值: inline_query) - Trigger on new incoming inline query
Message (值: message) - Trigger on new incoming message of any kind — text, photo, sticker, etc
Poll (值: poll) - Trigger on new poll state. Bots receive only updates about stopped polls and polls, which are sent by the bot.
Pre-Checkout Query (值: pre_checkout_query) - Trigger on new incoming pre-checkout query. Contains full information about checkout.
Shipping Query (值: shipping_query) - Trigger on new incoming shipping query. Only for invoices with flexible price.

attachmentNotice.displayName: Every uploaded attachment, even if sent in a group, will trigger a separate event. You can identify that an attachment belongs to a certain group by media_group_id .
attachmentNotice.name: attachmentNotice
attachmentNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Every uploaded attachment, even if sent in a group, will trigger a separate event. You can identify that an attachment belongs to a certain group by media_group_id .

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: download (值: None) - Telegram delivers the image in multiple sizes. By default, just the large image would be downloaded. If you want to change the size, set the field 'Image Size'.
imageSize (值: None) - The size of the image to be downloaded
chatIds (值: None) - The chat IDs to restrict the trigger to. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.
userIds (值: None) - The user IDs to restrict the trigger to. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.
